game.name: The New Queen
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The kingdom is on a bad situation, as followers of the rebellion attack, steal, and hurt what Lorelai loves the most: the people of Uboro. The queen must find a solution, and for this she depends upon three friends: Victoria, Alkor and Celine.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The kingdom is on a bad situation, as followers of the rebellion attack, steal, and hurt what Lorelai loves the most: the people of Uboro. The queen must find a solution, and for this she depends upon three friends: Victoria, Alkor and Celine.
